timeline.message:
NF: Task type becomes an enum

The main reason is that, instead of having timber stating:
"interrupted while waiting for previous task: 23", I'll gett
"interrupted while waiting for previous task:
TASK_TYPE_UPDATE_VALUES_FROM_DECK", and that will be really more readable

NF: Remove TASK_TYPE from enum name

The type should now be sufficient to understand what we are dealing
with. Timber message gets simpler

timeline.bodyText: Can you please define the integer values explicitly - I think we'll be fine here, but I've been burned a few times by someone adding enum values in the middle, or at the start, which changes all the values, and can lead to mismatches if they're persisted anywhere.
timeline.author: david-allison-1
